attachments.title: 16 Things You Probably Never Knew About The Short Circuit Movies
attachments.text: Right now, we’re falling in love with BB-8 from Star Wars—and yet, there’s still a special place in our hearts for Johnny Five, the robot from the Short Circuit films. But how much do you actually know about these films? Check out this video, featuring 16 electrifying facts about the making of this duology.
attachments.fallback: io9: 16 Things You Probably Never Knew About The Short Circuit Movies
